The World Youth Peace Summit brings scholar-athletes and scholar-artists from all over the world to Connecticut, so it truly is a natural partnership and we are thrilled to have the opportunity to incorporate the mission of the United Nations with the Summit's goals of promoting peace through athletics and the arts. Nobel Laureate and former United States Vice President Colin Powell and acclaimed author of Three Cups of Tea, Greg Mortenson , will speak at the World Youth Peace Summit, which comes to Connecticut in June and July,
